mapper.update:
update ADS_MONITOR_SAMPLE set PRODUCT_TRACEABILITY_CODE = #{productTraceabilityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORGAN_TASK_ID = #{organTaskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAMPLE_BAR_CODE = #{sampleBarCode,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SAMPLE_NAME = #{sampleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_CODE = #{sampleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRADE_MARK = #{tradeMark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PACKING = #{packing,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GRADE = #{grade,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IDENTIFY = #{identify,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SPECIFICATION = #{specification,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STANDARD = #{standard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCE_DATE = #{produceDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCE_CERTIFICATE = #{produceCertificate,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CERTIFICATE_CODE = #{certificateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_BASE = #{sampleBase,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SAMPLE_PLACE = #{samplePlace,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TESTED_DEPARMENT = #{testedDeparment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TESTED_ADDRESS = #{testedAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TESTED_LEGALREP = #{testedLegalrep,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TESTED_LINKMAN = #{testedLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TESTED_LINKMANPHONE = #{testedLinkmanphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TESTED_LINKMANFAX = #{testedLinkmanfax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TESTED_PERSON = #{testedPerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TESTED_PERSONPHONE = #{testedPersonphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TESTED_PERSONFAX = #{testedPersonfax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTIONS_TATUS = #{productionsTatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_DEPARMENT = #{productionDeparment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_ADDRESS = #{productionAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_ZIPCODE = #{productionZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_LINKMAN = #{productionLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_LINKMANPHONE = #{productionLinkmanphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PRODUCTION_LINKMANFAX = #{productionLinkmanfax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAMPLE_ID = #{sampleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAMPLE_DEPARMENT = #{sampleDeparment,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_LINKMAN = #{sampleLinkman,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_ADDRESS = #{sampleAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_ZIPCODE = #{sampleZipcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_PHONE = #{samplePhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_FAX = #{sampleFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_EMAIL = #{sampleEmail,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PROOF = #{proof,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_PERSON = #{samplePerson,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_DATE = #{sampleDate,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAMPLE_REPORT = #{sampleReport,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
COMMENT = #{comment,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_BY = #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATE_BY = #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_TIME = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select ID , PRODUCT_TRACEABILITY_CODE , ORGAN_TASK_ID , SAMPLE_BAR_CODE , SAMPLE_NAME , SAMPLE_CODE , TRADE_MARK , PACKING , GRADE , IDENTIFY , SPECIFICATION , STANDARD , PRODUCE_DATE , PRODUCE_CERTIFICATE , CERTIFICATE_CODE , SAMPLE_BASE , SAMPLE_PLACE , TESTED_DEPARMENT , TESTED_ADDRESS , TESTED_LEGALREP , TESTED_LINKMAN , TESTED_LINKMANPHONE , TESTED_LINKMANFAX , TESTED_PERSON , TESTED_PERSONPHONE , TESTED_PERSONFAX , PRODUCTIONS_TATUS , PRODUCTION_DEPARMENT , PRODUCTION_ADDRESS , PRODUCTION_ZIPCODE , PRODUCTION_LINKMAN , PRODUCTION_LINKMANPHONE , PRODUCTION_LINKMANFAX , SAMPLE_ID , SAMPLE_DEPARMENT , SAMPLE_LINKMAN , SAMPLE_ADDRESS , SAMPLE_ZIPCODE , SAMPLE_PHONE , SAMPLE_FAX , SAMPLE_EMAIL , PROOF , SAMPLE_PERSON , SAMPLE_DATE , SAMPLE_REPORT , "COMMENT" , DEL_FLAG , CREATE_BY , UPDATE_BY , CREATE_TIME , UPDATE_TIME from ADS_MONITOR_SAMPLE where ID =#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
